|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.100.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = DareGlobal |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/24/2017 |estprice = 200 |upc = |ean = 612572211373 |newegg = |asin = B01N6SKK1G |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== DOCSIS 3.1 & 32x8 DOCSIS 3.0 *Compatible with major cable providers: :*{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ''Xfinity'' :*{{Approved by service|Cox}} ''Cable'' :''Comcast Xfinity'' and ''Cox Cable'' approved. :*{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} :*{{Approved by service|Brighthouse}} :*{{Approved by service|Charter}} :Spectrum (''Charter, Time Warner and Brighthouse'') :and others pending approval. Advanced monitoring with PRTG: [https://github.com/JJWatMyself/cabletools GitHub] ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.mbreviews.com/arris-sb8200-review/ ''Arris SB8200 DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Modem Review'' on '''MBReviews'''] :[http://www.mbreviews.com/arris-sb8200-vs-netgear-cm1000/ ''Arris SB8200 vs Netgear CM1000: Which is the Best DOCSIS 3.1
Cable Modem?''] (CPU, Flash, RAM spec.) ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31219835-SB8200-32x8-3-1-cable-modem-Feedback-and-Results-thread~start=142 Teardown with internal images by ''xymox1'' on '''DSL Reports''' forum] :The Arris logo, "SB8200 ST MAIN BOARD.", "PWB:597403-001 RevM", :"PWB:ARCT04227" and "2016-10-20" are silkscreened on the PCB. :[https://www.dslreports.com/hardware/ARRIS-SB8200-h4544 Arris SB8200 Spec.] (OEM: [[DareGlobal]]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31238946-Equip-CM1000-vs-SB8200 ''(Equip) Netgear CM1000 vs Arris SB8200'' on '''DSL Reports''' forum] :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=20:3D:66 20:3D:66] (ARRIS Group, Inc.), PSU: 12V/2A, ==See also== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Arris SB6190]] - ''ARRIS SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem'' *[[Arris SBG6700-AC]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1600 WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: W5HSBG6782ACH (2013-05-20) - ''Wireless Gateway'' *[[Arris SVG2482-AC]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1750 WiFi Router'' :W5HSVG7782HH (2013-04-11) - ''Wireless Cable Modem Gateway'' *[[Motorola SURFboard SBG6580]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem/AC1750 WiFi Router'' :FCC ID: W5HSBG6580 (2010-01-18) - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Wi-Fi Gateway'' *[[ASUS CM-32]] - ''AC2600 WiFi 32x8 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router'' *[[Motorola MB8600]] - ''DOCSIS 3.1 Ultra Fast Speed Cable Modem'' *[[Netgear CM1000]] - ''DOCSIS 3.1 Ultra-High Speed Cable Modem'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
